title: Muting people that are on your friends list
body:
While Using the alpha client, I decided mute some of my friends during a normals game ("they were fighting between each other").  After the game ended, notice they weren't on my friend list.  So I Checked back on the old client and they were gone on there too.  I asked my friends on Skype why they deleted me and they said they didn't... They said I was just gone off their friend list after the game.
I check my block list they weren't on there. So I had re add all them back.  
I tried muting function on the old client and it did not delete them off my friend list after the game

Is the mute suppose to delete people off your friend list?

replies.body: We realized we went a little too aggressive with the intention of muting in game.  We've fixed this and in the next patch you'll only silence someone in-game, and not forever!
